- numpy
import numpy as np import datetime as dt from random import randint arr = np.array([1,5,8,4,9]) #print(arr) pyscript.write('result', f"My array is {arr}") pyscript.write('todaydate', dt.date.today().strftime('%d-%m-%Y')) def generate_random_num(): x = randint(0, 10) return x pyscript.write('rn', generate_random_num())
